docs.title: What is this?
docs.text: I have a home lab and this is the automation that I use to manage my deployment. Specifically this collection of ansible yaml files that do an initial and incremental configuration management on my hardware.

docs.title: Ummm if you already know what your doing why are you writing this?
docs.text: Because I'm tired, I work full time, I can't remember when I did things or why, this mkdocs is where I store my state at a given moment.
